00060     ProfileCollection_t(const std::string &collection_name,
00061                         const EVENT::StringVec &name_list, const lcio::IntVec &n_hist_list,
00062                         const HistPar &par)
00063       : _histogramCol(0),
00064         _majorIndex(0)

00069 
00076     ProfileCollection_t(lcio::LCCollection *profile_histograms, lcio::IntVec *indices)
00077       :_histogramCol(profile_histograms),
00078        _majorIndex(0)
00079     {
00080       if (indices) {
00081         if (indices->back()<profile_histograms->getNumberOfElements()) {
00082           indices->push_back(profile_histograms->getNumberOfElements());
00083         }
00084         // unfortunately there is currently no way to get the array which is attached to the LCIO collection.
00085         // so we have to maintain our own copy
00086         _majorIndex=new lcio::IntVec;
00087         _majorIndex->assign(indices->begin(),indices->end());
00088         profile_histograms->parameters().setValues(__majorIndexParameterName,*indices);
00089       }
00090     };
00091 
00098     ProfileCollection_t(lcio::LCCollection *profile_histograms)
00099       : _histogramCol(profile_histograms),
00100         _majorIndex(0)
00101     {
00102       if (profile_histograms->parameters().getNInt(__majorIndexParameterName)>0) {
00103         _majorIndex=new lcio::IntVec;
00104         profile_histograms->parameters().getIntVals(__majorIndexParameterName,*_majorIndex);
00105       }
00106     };
00107 
00110     ProfileCollection_t(const ProfileCollection_t &a)
00111       :_histogramCol(a._histogramCol),
00112        _majorIndex(0)
00113     {
00114       //    stat_copy(_histogramCol);
00115       if (a._majorIndex) {
00116         _majorIndex=new lcio::IntVec;
00117         _majorIndex->assign(a._majorIndex->begin(),a._majorIndex->end());
00118       }
00119       //    __instances++;
00120     };
00121 
00122 
00123     ~ProfileCollection_t() {
00124     }
00125 
00126 
00129     ProfileCollection_t() : _histogramCol(0),_majorIndex(0) {};
00130 
00134     void deleteCollection() {
00135       delete _histogramCol;
00136       _histogramCol=0;
00137       delete _majorIndex;
00138       _majorIndex=0;
00139     };
00140

00142       deleteCollection();
00143     }

00196 
00199     UInt_t n() const {
00200       return _histogramCol->getNumberOfElements();
00201     }
00202 
00205     bool is2D() const {
00206       return _majorIndex && _majorIndex->size()>1;
00207     };
00208 
00211     UInt_t nMajor() const {
00212 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00213       assert(_majorIndex);
00214 #endif
00215       return _majorIndex->size()-1;
00216     };
00219     UInt_t nMinor(UInt_t major_index) const {
00220       return (*_majorIndex)[major_index+1]-(*_majorIndex)[major_index];
00221     };
00222 
00225     const Profile1D *histogram(UInt_t index) const {
00226 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00227       range_check(index);
00228 #endif
00229       return dynamic_cast<Profile1D*>(_histogramCol->getElementAt(index));
00230     };
00231 
00234     Profile1D *histogram(UInt_t index)  {
00235 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00236       range_check(index);
00237 #endif
00238       return dynamic_cast<Profile1D*>(_histogramCol->getElementAt(index));
00239     };

00243     Profile1D *histogram(UInt_t major_index, UInt_t minor_index)  {
00244       UInt_t index=get_index(major_index,minor_index);
00245       return dynamic_cast<Profile1D*>(_histogramCol->getElementAt(index));
00246     };
00247 
00250     const Profile1D *histogram(UInt_t major_index, UInt_t minor_index) const {
00251       UInt_t index=get_index(major_index,minor_index);
00252       return dynamic_cast<Profile1D*>(_histogramCol->getElementAt(index));
00253     };
00254 
00259     const std::string &getName(UInt_t major_index) const {
00260       if (_nameList.empty()) copyNames();
00261       if (_nameList.size()==1) {
00262         return _nameList[0];
00263       }
00264 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00265       assert( major_index < _nameList.size());
00266 #endif
00267       return _nameList[major_index];
00268     };
00269 
00270   private:
00271 
00275     void copyNames() const {
00276       if (_nameList.empty()) {
00277         _histogramCol->getParameters().getStringVals(__histogramNameParameterName,_nameList);
00278         if (_nameList.empty()) {
00279           _nameList.push_back(__defaultProfileName);
00280         }
00281       }
00282     }
00283 
00284     lcio::LCCollection  *_histogramCol;   
00285     lcio::IntVec        *_majorIndex;     
00287     mutable lcio::StringVec  _nameList;   
00290     static const std::string __majorIndexParameterName;
00291 
00292 
00293   protected:
00294 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00295     void range_check(UInt_t index) const throw (std::range_error) {
00296       if (index>=static_cast<UInt_t>(_histogramCol->getNumberOfElements())) {
00297         std::stringstream message;
00298         message << "Range error accessing histogram " << index << ". Ther are only "
00299                 << _histogramCol->getNumberOfElements() << " profile histograms in the collection.";
00300         throw std::range_error(message.str());
00301       }
00302     }
00303 #endif
00304 
00305     UInt_t get_index(UInt_t major_index, UInt_t minor_index) const throw (std::range_error)
00306     {
00307 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00308       if (!_majorIndex) {
00309         throw std::logic_error("A major index was specified but the index collection does not exist.");
00310       }
00311 
00312       if (major_index>=_majorIndex->size()) {
00313         std::stringstream message;
00314         message << "Major index " << major_index << " out of ranger. The index collection contains only "
00315                 << _majorIndex->size() << " indices.";
00316         throw std::range_error(message.str());
00317       }
00318 #endif
00319 
00320       UInt_t index=(*_majorIndex)[major_index]+minor_index;
00321 
00322 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00323       if (index>=static_cast<UInt_t>(_histogramCol->getNumberOfElements())) {
00324         std::stringstream message;
00325         message << "Range error accessing histogram " << index << ". Ther are only "
00326                 << _histogramCol->getNumberOfElements() << " profile histograms in the collection.";
00327         throw std::range_error(message.str());
00328       }
00329 #endif
00330       return index;
00331     }
00332 
00333 
00334     static const std::string __histogramNameParameterName;
00335   private:
00336     static const std::string __defaultProfileName;
00337 
00338   };
00339 }
